mapper.sql: id, user_name, real_name, password, mobile_no, email, create_time, update_time, login_count
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, user_name, real_name, password, mobile_no, email, create_time, update_time, login_count ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginCount,jdbcType=BIGINT} )

insert into sys_user
id,
user_name,
real_name,
password,
mobile_no,
email,
create_time,
update_time,
login_count,

mapper.update:
update sys_user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile_no = #{mobileNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
login_count = #{loginCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_no = #{mobileNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login_count = #{loginCount,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from sys_user where user_name=#{userName} and password=#{password}
